original_title: Barty's Brew-Ha-Ha 4: Tale of the Legend of the Crystal Chubacabra
overview: Barty Anderson is back, and better than ever! This time, he is being tasked with finding the elusive Crystal Chubacabra. But is he prepared for the truth behind it all?
title: Barty's Brew-Ha-Ha 4: Tale of the Legend of the Crystal Chubacabra
